title: math/rand: default Source safe for concurrent use
body:
The `math/rand` documentation states:
> The default Source is safe for concurrent use by multiple goroutines.

This confused me because I thought the "default Source" referred to Source returned by the NewSource function. Instead, it refers to the protected internal Source used by the top-level functions.

* [Introductory Commit](https://github.com/golang/go/commit/e97c870692aa80feabd2e22c191476220fc1281f)
* [Source](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/release-branch.go1.5/src/math/rand/rand.go#L11)
